text: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Onitsha () was established on 18th April, 1950. Leadership: Valerian Okeke, Archbishop of Onitsha. ==Localities and organizations== ===Schools=== * Christ the King College, Onitsha * Queen of the Rosary College, Onitsha * Regina Pacis Secondary,Onitsha * Mater Amabilis Secondary school, Umuoji * St. Kizito Secondaryschool, Umudioka * St. Charles College, Onitsha ===The Archbishop=== It houses the Archbishop who lives in the Basilica of the Most Holy Trinity, Onitsha, the only basilica of Roman Catholicism in Nigeria. ==Bibliography== * The History of the Catholic Church in Nigeria. (1982). Nigeria: Macmillan Nigeria. * Ozigboh, I. R. A. (1999). A History of Igboland in the 20th Century. Nigeria: University of Nigeria. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Onitsha Category:Nigeria
title: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Onitsha
